turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Merovingen Nights.
turn.2: Merovingen Nights Merovingen Nights is a series of shared universe science fantasy books set in writer C. J. Cherryh's Alliance-Union universe.
turn.4: There are eight books in the series, a novel by Cherryh, "Angel with the Sword", and seven short fiction anthologies which Cherryh edited.
turn.6: The books were published by DAW Books between 1985 and 1991. "Angel with the Sword" was originally published by Cherryh in 1985 as a free-standing novel.
turn.8: The "Merovingen Nights" series came into being two years later when Cherryh began editing seven anthologies that were set in the same universe as "Angel with the Sword".
turn.9: Is there anything else interesting about Merovingen Nights?
turn.10: "Angel with the Sword" was subsequently republished with the "Merovingen Nights" branding.
turn.11: Do the books have a theme?
turn.12: The books take place on the planet Merovin in the Alliance-Union universe after AD 3240, and as such, they are definitively science fiction.
